revision.comment: remove old maintained template, user retired
revision.text:
{{ArticleHistory |action1=GAN |action1date=04:36, 1 October 2010 (UTC) |action1link=Talk:2010 Pichilemu earthquake/GA1 |action1result=listed |action1oldid=388043279 |action2=PR |action2date=23:03, 17 October 2010 |action2link=Wikipedia:Peer review/2010 Pichilemu earthquake/archive1 |action2result=reviewed |action2oldid=389155305 |action3=PR |action3date=19:20, 18 June 2012 |action3link=Wikipedia:Peer review/2010 Pichilemu earthquake/archive2 |action3result=reviewed |action3oldid=497543229 | dykdate = 18 March 2010 | dykentry = ... that 6.9 [[Moment magnitude scale|Mw]] '''[[2010 Pichilemu earthquake|Chile earthquake]]''' of March 2010 took place shortly before [[President of Chile|president]] [[Sebastián Piñera]], was sworn in? | topic = Geography and places |currentstatus=GA }} {{talkheader}} {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WPCHILE|class=GA|importance=High}} {{WikiProject Earthquakes|class=GA|importance=High}} {{WikiProject Disaster management|class=GA|importance=High}} {{WP1.0|v0.9=pass|class=GA|category=Geography|v0.8=pass}} }} == merge == an aftershock - should be merged --[[User:De Administrando Imperio|D'''A'''I]] ([[User talk:De Administrando Imperio|'''Δ''']]) 17:34, 11 March 2010 (UTC) no its a different earthquake [[Special:Contributions/78.184.32.58|78.184.32.58]] ([[User talk:78.184.32.58|talk]]) 17:37, 11 March 2010 (UTC) :AFTERSHOCK. Read sources [http://english.aljazeera.net/news/americas/2010/03/2010311152233248405.html] [http://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/americas/8561340.stm] --[[User:De Administrando Imperio|D'''A'''I]] ([[User talk:De Administrando Imperio|'''Δ''']]) 17:40, 11 March 2010 (UTC) ::Not so sure about clear aftershock nature: [http://earthquake.usgs.gov/earthquakes/recenteqsww/Quakes/us2010tsa6.php#summary] says "almost certainly occurred as the result of the change of regional stress caused by the February 27 earthquake", but then "however, imply that the March 11 shocks occurred as the result of normal faulting within the subducting Nazca plate or the overriding South America plate, unlike the February 27 earthquake". Suggest to wait with merge until geological analysis comeplete. --[[Special:Contributions/190.161.142.101|190.161.142.101]] ([[User talk:190.161.142.101|talk]]) 18:33, 11 March 2010 (UTC) :::There's no need to be merged, it's a different earthquake. [[Special:Contributions/78.2.98.205|78.2.98.205]] ([[User talk:78.2.98.205|talk]]) 21:41, 12 March 2010 (UTC) ==Move request==
:''The following discussion is an archived discussion of a [[WP:RM|requested move]]. '''Please do not modify it.''' Subsequent comments should be made in a new section on the talk page. No further edits should be made to this section. '' The result of the move request was: '''page moved'''. [[User:December21st2012Freak|'''December21st2012Freak''']] [[user talk:December21st2012Freak|'''Happy St. Patrick's Day!''']] 02:07, 16 March 2010 (UTC) ---- {{tlp|helpme}} [[:March 2010 Chile earthquake]] → [[2010 Pichilemu earthquake]] — Please move it to [[2010 Pichilemu earthquake]], it was specified by Chilean news media later, read: http://www.elrancahuaso.cl/admin/render/noticia/22248 http://www.el-carabobeno.com/p_pag_not.aspx?art=a120310i02&id=t120310-i02 http://www.chile.com/tpl/articulo/detalle/ver.tpl?cod_articulo=118476 http://24horas.cl/videos.aspx?id=63158 —Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[Special:Contributions/190.110.134.84|190.110.134.84]] ([[User talk:190.110.134.84|talk]]) 09:35, March 14, 2010 :The correct process would be to post a formal request. Please go to [[Wikipedia:Requested moves]] and follow the instructions there. -- [[User:OlEnglish|œ]][[User talk:OlEnglish|™]] 17:02, 14 March 2010 (UTC) :: [[simple:2010 Pichilemu earthquake]] has the correct information about this earthquake. --[[Special:Contributions/190.110.135.109|190.110.135.109]] ([[User talk:190.110.135.109|talk]]) 18:28, 14 March 2010 (UTC) http://24horas.cl/videos.aspx?id=63158 :::'''Support'''.--[[User:De Administrando Imperio|D'''A'''I]] ([[User talk:De Administrando Imperio|'''Δ''']]) 20:52, 14 March 2010 (UTC) :''The above discussion is preserved as an archive of a [[WP:RM|requested move]]. '''Please do not modify it.''' Subsequent comments should be made in a new section on this talk page. No further edits should be made to this section.
{{Talk:2010 Pichilemu earthquake/GA1}} ==Mercalli== ¿X Mercalli? :/ —Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[Special:Contributions/190.161.176.61|190.161.176.61]] ([[User talk:190.161.176.61|talk]]) 19:39, 20 January 2011 (UTC) *It reached X Mercalli magnitude in [[Navidad, Chile|Navidad]], and [[Pichilemu]], at least. [[User:Diego Grez|Diego Grez]] ([[User talk:Diego Grez|talk]]) 20:10, 20 January 2011 (UTC) :I just changed the shake map to one that, although less clear in some ways, shows various cities and gives a key to the colours using the Mercalli scale. This shows that intensities reached about X on that scale in the epicentral region. [[User:Mikenorton|Mikenorton]] ([[User talk:Mikenorton|talk]]) 21:12, 20 January 2011 (UTC) ::Cool! [[User:Diego Grez|Diego Grez]] ([[User talk:Diego Grez|talk]]) 21:26, 20 January 2011 (UTC)
